mapper.select: SELECT UMA_CODE, UMA_NAME, UMA_HEIGHT, UMA_WEIGHT, THREE_B, THREE_W, THREE_H, BIRTH_DAY, UMA_VOICE, UMA_CONTENT, UMA_TAG, UMA_COLOR FROM UMA_DATA
SELECT UMA_CODE, UMA_NAME, UMA_HEIGHT, UMA_WEIGHT, THREE_B, THREE_W, THREE_H, BIRTH_DAY, UMA_VOICE, UMA_CONTENT, UMA_TAG, UMA_COLOR FROM UMA_DATA WHERE UMA_CODE = #{uma_code}

SELECT B.UMA_CODE , B.UMA_NAME , B.UMA_COLOR , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) DESC) AS RANKING, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) AS COUNT FROM PIXIV_DATA A JOIN UMA_DATA B ON( A.UMA_CODE = B.UMA_CODE ) GROUP by B.UMA_NAME, B.UMA_CODE, B.UMA_COLOR order by RANKING

SELECT A.UMA_CODE ,A.UMA_NAME ,A.UMA_TAG ,A.UMA_COLOR ,A.COUNT ,A.RANKING FROM ( SELECT B.UMA_NAME, B.UMA_CODE, B.UMA_TAG, B.UMA_COLOR , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{day_count} DAY),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) DESC) AS RANKING , COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{day_count} DAY),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) AS COUNT FROM PIXIV_DATA A JOIN UMA_DATA B ON( A.UMA_CODE = B.UMA_CODE ) group by B.UMA_CODE, B.UMA_NAME, B.UMA_TAG, B.UMA_COLOR )A WHERE A.RANKING=1

SELECT B.UMA_CODE , B.UMA_NAME , B.UMA_COLOR , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{date} DAY),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) DESC) AS RANKING, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{date} DAY),'%y/%m/%d') THEN 1 END) AS COUNT FROM PIXIV_DATA A JOIN UMA_DATA B ON( A.UMA_CODE = B.UMA_CODE ) GROUP by B.UMA_NAME, B.UMA_CODE, B.UMA_COLOR order by RANKING

SELECT B.UMA_CODE , B.UMA_NAME , B.UMA_COLOR , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y/%m') THEN 1 END) DESC) AS RANKING, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD_DATE,'%y/%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y/%m') THEN 1 END) AS COUNT FROM PIXIV_DATA A JOIN UMA_DATA B ON( A.UMA_CODE = B.UMA_CODE ) GROUP by B.UMA_NAME, B.UMA_CODE, B.UMA_COLOR order by RANKING
